title: What Strategist Readers Are Buying: Scalp Brushes and Pimple Patches
text:
10. Wamsutta Extra-Firm Side-Sleeper Pillow (8)

If you’re thinking it’s time to replace your pillow, this longtime favorite of ours would be a solid pick. We discovered it when we tested out a wide selection of pillows designed for side sleepers and concluded that the Wamsutta Extra-Firm was the most comfortable and supportive of them all: “Unlike other pillows that mistake plushness or fluffiness for support,” our reviewer, Jason Chen, wrote, “the WEF didn’t sink as soon as I rested my head. Instead, it had a firm, satisfying spring — it’s a different sensation but one I took to right away. And even though I didn’t do any measuring, my head felt more propped up from the mattress and sheets than with any other pillow.”
description: This week’s best-selling products among Strategist readers include Oral-B electric toothbrushes, Boon bath toys, Cosrx pimple patches, RoC retinol wrinkle cream, Purito sunscreen, Überlube lube, Wamsutta pillows, and more.
